long_description: Waterproof, breathable and stretchy, the Merrell Transcend Blazer for men delivers subtle bike-commuting features in a blazer style. Nylon/spandex M-Select Dry fabric keeps you dry and comfortable on your commute. A durable water repellent finish helps moisture bead up and roll off. Collar folds up to reveal a reflective tab for discreet visibility in low light. Matte-button front placket covers a metaluxe zipper. Center-back vent adds mobility and airflow for comfort. The Merrell Transcend Blazer features welted hand pockets, a slant chest pocket and shaping seams on the front.
short_description: Waterproof, breathable and stretchy, the Merrell Transcend Blazer for men delivers subtle bike-commuting features in a blazer style.
